articles.title: The Epic Siberian Journey to Solve a Mass Extinction Mystery - WIRED
articles.description: A quarter-billion years ago, huge volcanic eruptions burned coal, leading to the worst extinction in Earth’s history. Here’s how scientists hunted down the evidence.

articles.title: Scientists found the center of the Solar System, and it's not where you think - Inverse
articles.description: Using the signals of pulsar stars, scientists have pinpointed the center of the Solar System to 100 meters.
